title: the Health (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 2021 (No. 24 of 2021)) of the Health Act
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Sections
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Sections 
indoor premises) 

31AB and 31AD) (Covid-19) (Operation of certain 
(Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 6th day of

title: the Health (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 2021 (No. 24 of 2021)) of the Health Act
heading: 2. Regulation 3 of the Health Act 1947 (Sections 31AB and 31AD)
text_raw:
2. Regulation 3 of the Health Act 1947 (Sections 31AB and 31AD) 
(Covid-19) (Operation of certain indoor premises) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 
385 of 2021) is amended – 

(a) 

in paragraph (1) – 

(i) 

by the substitution in subparagraph (g) of “regulations.” 
for “regulations;”, 

(ii) by the deletion of subparagraph (h), and 

(iii) by the deletion of subparagraph (i), 

and 

(b) 

in paragraph (2), by the substitution of “subparagraphs (a) to 
(g)” for “subparagraphs (a) to (i)”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 7th September, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [451] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

4 September, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [451]

title: the Health (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 2021 (No. 24 of 2021)) of the Health Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Sections 31AB and 31AD) 
(Covid-19) (Operation of certain indoor premises) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 
385 of 2021) to remove the prohibition on live performances and dancing in 
indoor dining premises. The Regulations remain in effect until 9th October
text_norm: explanatory note (this note part instrument purport legal interpretation.) regulation amend health act 1947 (sections 31ab 31ad) (covid-19) (operation certain indoor premises) regulation 2021 (s.i no 385 2021) remove prohibition live performance dancing indoor dining premise regulation remain effect 9th october
